title: Choose games to maximize probability of winning

content.description: The probability of winning a certain game is 0.5. If at least 70 percent of the games in a series of n games are won, the player wins a prize. If the possible choices for n are
content.question: n=10, n=20, and n=100, which value of n should the player choose in order to maximize the probability of winning a prize?

choices.label: n=10 or n=20 only; the probabilities are the same.
n=10 or n=20 or n=100 ; the probabilities are the same.
